p: Antioxidative effects of electrospun nanofibers have also been proven by obtaining multifunctional biomaterials, especially through the use of vitamin E and natural biopolymers [ 105]. Fibers resulting from the combination of polylactic acid, silver nanoparticles and vit. E inhibited the growth of Escherichia coli up to 100%. The release time of silver ions from nanofibres immersed in water lasted up to 10 days. It was proved that the combination of polylactic acid nanofibres, silver nanoparticles and vitamin E showed antioxidant activity in studies on fresh apple juice [ 112].
